channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IL

item.title: Report I-2024050052
item.description:
Report I-2024050052

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-18T15:12:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-21
  • City: GALT
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: WAYNE TRANSPORTS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Unit 1 was traveling West on 1-88 at approximately milepost 27. Unit 1 departed the roadway to the right and entered a grass ditch/ embankment. Unit 1 overturned. Unit 1 product was released from top port. Erie/ Rock Falls Fire responded. IL Dept of Conservation notified to examine any waterway contamination. Illinois Emergency Management Agency notified. Product Isolated/ contatned by sand delivered by Illinois Dept. of Transportation. Company arranged for Hazardous Material response and removal by HMR (HazMat Response) from Des Moines, IA (DOT 555940).
